definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: On his birthday, I gave him some cufflinks as a present.
sentences.chinese: 他生日那天，我送給他了一些袖口作爲禮物。

sentences.english: He wiped his nose on his cuff and cleared his throat.
sentences.chinese: 他用袖口擦擦鼻子，清了清嗓子。

sentences.english: That's rib as in knitting(4) the cuff(5) of your sweater.
sentences.chinese: 我們所說的羅紋編織正是你毛衣袖口的織法。

sentences.english: Featuring elasticated cuffs and an easy to use ring pull zip.
sentences.chinese: 設有鬆緊袖口和一個易於使用的拉鍊拉環。

sentences.english: Epaulettes, belted waist and cuffs, central back vent.
sentences.chinese: 肩飾，腰部和袖口束帶，背部開褶中心透氣位。

sentences.english: Black enamel coated snap fasteners on cuff straps and concealed in pocket flaps.
sentences.chinese: 袖口鈕袢和袋口暗袋脣打黑色按扣。

sentences.english: The wristband has a velcro strap clasp.
sentences.chinese: 袖口有魔術貼的皮帶扣。

sentences.english: He liked the rib stitch on the cuffs of the sweater.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡在這毛衣袖口上的羅紋針織。

sentences.english: And the cuff and buttom of the jacket are also slim, no space. So jacket is easy to warm.
sentences.chinese: 另外袖口，下襬一般都是收身的，所以也不易漏風。

sentences.english: Running the collars and cuffs through the mangle was also Joe's idea.
sentences.chinese: 同熱軋滾筒熨領子和袖口也是喬的主意。

sentences.english: The boy’s hands are pulled up inside the cuffs of his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 男孩的手揣在襯衣袖口裏面。

sentences.english: She struggles around and then she is hogtied with various cuffs and chains.
sentences.chinese: 她掙扎，然後捆綁與各種袖口和鏈。
鉤環緊固件的可調式袖口。

sentences.english: Jacket cuffs planning, work fine, take the line close, strong wear resistance.
sentences.chinese: 上衣袖口規劃，做工精細，走線緊密，健壯耐磨。

sentences.english: Knit ribbing from ankle to cuff.
sentences.chinese: 從腳踝到袖口的針織羅紋。

definition: collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
hidden snap fastener (concealed behind a flap on a garment)
crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
